title: New: Favela – Gong
content:
It’s been the best part of a year since we heard original material from 22 year old Leeds based producer, Favela, and aside from a few remixes, he’s been completely quiet.

His newest offering, Gong, is a welcome return, and certainly of the same sort of standard as Easy Yoke, which had us salivating last year. Slicker than Fyfe, as melodic as James Blake and with the glistening production associated with the likes of SOHN, it’s further indication of his exceptional talents. Check out Gong below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
